options.name: autofocus
options.desc: auto focus when open MessageBox

options.name: title
options.desc: title of the MessageBox

options.name: message
options.desc: content of the MessageBox

options.name: dangerouslyUseHTMLString
options.desc: whether message is treated as HTML string

options.name: type
options.desc: message type, used for icon display

options.name: icon
options.desc: custom icon component, overrides type

options.name: closeIcon
options.desc: custom close icon component, default is Close(2.9.5)

options.name: customClass
options.desc: custom class name for MessageBox

options.name: customStyle
options.desc: custom inline style for MessageBox

options.name: modalClass
options.desc: custom class names for mask

options.name: callback
options.desc: MessageBox closing callback if you don't prefer Promise
options.optionValue: (value: string, action: Action) => any | (action: Action) => any

options.name: showClose
options.desc: whether to show close icon of MessageBox

options.name: beforeClose
options.desc: callback before MessageBox closes, and it will prevent MessageBox from closing
options.optionValue: (action: Action, instance: MessageBoxState, done: () => void) => void

options.name: distinguishCancelAndClose
options.desc: whether to distinguish canceling and closing the MessageBox

options.name: lockScroll
options.desc: whether to lock body scroll when MessageBox prompts

options.name: showCancelButton
options.desc: whether to show a cancel button
options.defaultValue: false (true when called with confirm and prompt)

options.name: showConfirmButton
options.desc: whether to show a confirm button

options.name: cancelButtonText
options.desc: text content of cancel button

options.name: confirmButtonText
options.desc: text content of confirm button

options.name: cancelButtonLoadingIcon
options.desc: loading icon content of cancel button(2.7.7)

options.name: confirmButtonLoadingIcon
options.desc: loading icon content of confirm button(2.7.7)

options.name: cancelButtonClass
options.desc: custom class name of cancel button

options.name: confirmButtonClass
options.desc: custom class name of confirm button

options.name: closeOnClickModal
options.desc: whether MessageBox can be closed by clicking the mask

options.name: closeOnPressEscape
options.desc: whether MessageBox can be closed by pressing the ESC

options.name: closeOnHashChange
options.desc: whether to close MessageBox when hash changes

options.name: showInput
options.desc: whether to show an input

options.name: inputPlaceholder
options.desc: placeholder of input

options.name: inputType
options.desc: type of input

options.name: inputValue
options.desc: initial value of input

options.name: inputPattern
options.desc: regexp for the input

options.name: inputValidator
options.desc: validation function for the input. Should returns a boolean or string. If a string is returned, it will be assigned to inputErrorMessage

options.name: inputErrorMessage
options.desc: error message when validation fails

options.name: center
options.desc: whether to align the content in center

options.name: draggable
options.desc: whether MessageBox is draggable

options.name: overflow
options.desc: draggable MessageBox can overflow the viewport(2.5.4)

options.name: roundButton
options.desc: whether to use round button

options.name: buttonSize
options.desc: custom size of confirm and cancel buttons

options.name: appendTo
options.desc: set the root element for the message box(2.2.19)
